definition: state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
strategic experts as thick as rain (idiom); no shortage of advisers on strategy

sentences.english: He knew this was a famous adviser to the king, so he decided to follow his words.
sentences.chinese: 他知道這個謀臣深得國王寵信，因此決定試一試。

sentences.english: So he went and told this story to his friend, an adviser to the king.
sentences.chinese: 於是就去把這件事說給國王的一個謀臣，他的朋友聽。

sentences.english: So he decided to give him a gift of 100,000 gold coins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他決定將十萬金幣作爲禮物送給那位謀臣。

sentences.english: The king appointed him to the adviser's position.
sentences.chinese: 國王任命他接替謀臣的職位。
